attributes.review: this app is racist. just like the big cheeto man himself. when i opened the app it called me the n-word with a hard R and then told me to go back to my country. this was experience was traumatizing. please never download this app unless you’re a cis-het white man or you will be verbally assaulted 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽
attributes.title: RACIST

attributes.review: This app gave me STAGE 4 chlamydia. It’s made my husband leave with the kids. It’s also responsible for my divorce BY THE WAY. This Trump guy is also very racist, did not know that. If I did I would have never downloaded it. I’m so miserable because this app was invented. Worst app. Waste of my time. Ruined my life.
attributes.title: SETTLE FOR BIDEN

attributes.review: I don’t understand how someone with so much money could make something so bad. I thought it was a kid friendly app. IT IS NOT!!!! Don’t let your children download or even see this disgrace. This need to be BANDED!!!!! Our president should not be doing things like this.
attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL

attributes.review: This app collects your data in order to spam your phone with pro-trump propaganda. This in no way should be labeled as a news app. I downloaded it to be able to see what Trump is up to so I have more evidence against him but it is pure propaganda.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: I woke up at 7pm in the morning to feed my pet fish but it was starving because it ate mcdonalds baconator. Then yesterday I woke up tomorrow to go on a jog but my shoes were on the run. This made me fail my exam because I got 100% so I couldn’t fail the last grade because I got a F.
attributes.title: This app is bad

attributes.review: You are just a really bad person and if you can’t see that and if your soon not going to fix it then you are going to live a bad life and you are going to hell.
attributes.title: You wasted time of my life with this

attributes.review: I downloaded the app so i could see what the president was up to but it wouldn’t work at all the screen got super glitchy and wouldn’t let me do anything so save yourself some time and don’t get the app p.s came from that tiktok
attributes.title: Worst app ever

attributes.review: At first I was like “Alright, let’s go.” But when I opened the app, Mr. Cheeto popped up out of nowhere and scared the daylights out of me. Oh, to see without my eyes. I was scarred for the rest of my life. Save yourselves from the glitches and the stitches this app will give you and your phone.
attributes.title: Not In My Holy House

attributes.review: This app is horrific! It did something terrible to my phone! Out of nowhere my screen turned orange and it started spouting racial slurs until I uninstalled it! Also made my phone feel slimey 0/10 would recommend
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: The app set up is awful🤮 this is useless should never be used by anyone ever. This advertisement is very annoying a gain should never be used, who ever invented this should be locked up immediately. Thank you for your time!
attributes.title: Disgusting App
